scripts.build: [[ -z "${PSP_DOCKER}" ]] && npm run _build || npm run _emsdk -- npm run _build
scripts.build_test: [[ -z "${PSP_DOCKER}" ]] && npm run _build_test || npm run _emsdk -- npm run _build_test
scripts.test: npm run _test_perspective && npm run _test_viewer && npm run _test_hypergrid && npm run _test_highcharts
scripts._test_perspective: PACKAGE=perspective npm run _puppeteer -- npm run test
scripts._test_viewer: PACKAGE=perspective-viewer npm run _puppeteer -- npm run test
scripts._test_hypergrid: PACKAGE=perspective-viewer-hypergrid npm run _puppeteer -- npm run test
scripts._test_highcharts: PACKAGE=perspective-viewer-highcharts npm run _puppeteer -- npm run test
